"Ah, <%me>!<br>Perfect timing!":
"Fufufu~ I've finally accomplished it!
I've bridged a mechanism that allows us to see Earth's progress!"

"Simply put, we can catch up on Hitsugi's and
everyone's progress with live video information!
*Sigh*... I had a hard time getting this done too~"
"1. Peeping is bad."
"2. Sounds interesting."

"No, no! We're not peeping at all!
I said so before--it's all for the latest,
honest data!"

"Fufu~ I know right!
You're also concerned about the
situation over there, right <%me>?"

"Even though Earth's major threat has been eliminated,
Ether is still continuing to spread.
Hence, the frequent occurence of Phantoms."

"Instead of giving sorties upon information
that's brought to us, it's also essential to
observe the situation as much as we can
and monitor via suppression control"

"Now THAT'S the reason for our mechanism.
It'll never be used for the purpose of peeping... ever!"

"Now then~
Let's test to see what type of
information we'll receive."

"Haaah~ Nothing like a piping hot soak~
One good thing about this school is the
huge size of their dorm bath."
"Yup. Well... I have to agreee on that, but first..."
"Why are YOU guys here?!"

"No matter where we go or which bath
we take, it's all the same.
You'll 100% complain anyway."

"Throwing in my two cents,
you can probably expect more of this
treatment, Ms. Dorm Manager."

"Why'd they even give ME that title?
It was our timely arrival, wasn't it?
They needed one, and we were there!"

"Speaking of which, aren't you being a bit
rude to your teacher and elder? Show some
respect, little miss student council president!"
"No way! You're not my homeroom teacher!"

"Then how about I make the next test
200% more difficult? Just for you..."
"Okay then. I'll just ace it anyway."

"That's quite enough, children.
The bathtub is no battlefield,
so please leave your conflicts at the door."
"Yes ma'am..."
"Yes ma'am..."

"W-wait, why's Phaleg here?!
She's an outsider, right? You're the
student council president! Do something!"

"Like I can do anything! Besides,
wouldn't that be YOUR job as faculty staff?
Come on, Ms. Och! Do something!"

"At it again, I see. Won't give up, will they?
Quite adorable that they're so alike, really..."

"Umm... Phul?
Is something wrong?"
"...Your chest is."
"Huh?"

"How'd you get your breasts so big?
I want mine to grow bigger too..."
"I, uh... I never really pay attention to it..."

"What do you eat? What do you think about?
What do you do? What should I do?
Come on, tell me!"

"W-wait, shouldn't you be asking Phaleg?
Aren't hers bigger?!"
"That, my darlings, is the fruits of my daily training!"
"D-does that even work?"
"It absolutely does!"
"100% of the time!"
"You've got to be kidding me!"

"……クゥ、いろいろやってるけど
全部効果なしだもんね。"

"うっさいよフル！
いいのよ、あんなのは１００％無駄な脂肪よ脂肪！
ほらヒツギ、あんたも何か言ってやりなさい！"

"いや、流石にあんたと一緒にされるのはちょっと。
ゼロとイチの間には絶対的な差があるって
どっかの新任教師さんに習ったし。"

"やかましい！
あいつらにくらべれば、あたしもフルも
あんたもぜーんぶ誤差よ誤差！"

"……誤差でかすぎだよ、クゥ。
あ、そういえばこの前、そんな文言の文句つけて
あのエンガって男の子の課題突き返してたよね。"

"な、なんでアイツの話が出てくるのよ！
それは関係ないでしょーが！"

"あー……申し訳ないけど
兄さんは大きい方が好きだと思うよ？"
"聞いてないっての！"

"ていうか男ってみんなそうじゃない？
ねえ、コオリ。"

"わ、わたしに振らないでよー！
男の人には興味ないし、わたしは
ヒツギちゃんぐらいのが好きだよー！"
"……どうでもいい情報が入ってきた。"

"だー、もう！
だったらその持ちぐされてるの
あたしに５０％ぐらいよこしなさい！"
"ふああっ！？"
"……クゥ、教師が生徒にセクハラはよくない。"

"セクハラじゃないわよ！
これは、スキンシップよ！
おらおらおら！"

"……お止めなさい、オークゥ。
見苦しいですよ。"
"ぐぬぬ……"

"本当の愛とは、最終的には身体を超越します。
お嬢さん方が言っているような、胸の大きさなど
さしたる問題ではありません。"

"重要なのは、おのおのの心です。
皆さんは今回の事件で、それを学んだはずでは？"

"皆さん、まだまだお若い。
素敵な恋をし、正しき愛を育むとよろしい。
それこそが、人の営みというものなのですから。"

"……すごい説得力。
経験者は語る、ってやつだね。"
"経験者……なの？"
"あたしが知るわけないでしょ。"

"あ、あのー……
つかぬことをうかがいますが
ファレグさんって、何歳なんですか？"

"いきなりぶっこんだ！
すごいなこのヤンデレ！"

"……しかし、いい質問！
誰もが聞きたかった事よ、それ！
グッジョブ、コオリ！"

"経てきた年月の値に、意味はありません。
心がそうありたいと願うように、ですよ。"

"えっと……
こ、今回のも、秘匿しておきましょうか。"

"私は何も見ませんでした！
<%me>さんも同じ！
役得だと思って、二人の秘密としましょう！"
